net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: basicToon = getProperty ("dndb_BasicToon")] [h, if (encode (basicToon) == ""), code: { [h: error = "You must initialize with DNDBeyond first"] [h: abort (input ( " junk | | " + error + " | LABEL | TEXT=false"))] [h: return (0, error)] }; {}]
[h: overrideSubObj = getProperty ("_dndb_OverrideBasicToon")] [h: log.debug ("overrideSubObj: " + overrideSubObj)] [h, if (json.length (overrideSubObj) > 0), code: { [h: basicToon = json.merge (basicToon, overrideSubObj)] <!-- Do not save basicToon back to token. This should be a --> <!-- transient override --> [h: log.warn (json.get (basicToon, "name") + " has had override values applied")] }; {}] [h: macro.return = basicToon]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dndb_getBasicToon
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Reads data in _dndb_OverrideBasicToon and merges the defined JSON object into dndb_BasicToon. Then returns that BasicToon
